title: FDA Extends Shelf-Life of Pfizer COVID-19 Vaccine - APIC
cleaned_text: Public Policy [Regulations](https://apic.org/advocacy/regulations/) [Home](https://apic.org)> [Advocacy Updates](https://apic.org/advocacy_update/)> [Covid](https://apic.org/category/covid/?post_type=advocacy_update)> FDA Extends Shelf-Life of Pfizer COVID-19 Vaccine The FDA approved a request from Pfizer, Inc. to extend the shelf-life of the Pfizer COVID-19 vaccine for an additional three months - from six months to nine months — when the vaccine is stored at a temperature of -90 to -60 degrees Celsius. The extension is also applicable to batches that might have expired prior to this amendment. Read the revised [fact sheet
